name: BibleThemes-FindBibleversesaboutatheme
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bible themes
des:
Bible Themes is the quickest way to find a quote from the Bible on a given theme. Simply tell Alexa what theme you are thinking of and she will find a suitable Bible quote from the King James Bible. With over 100 themes and more than 600 quotes, you will never get bored.

Popular themes include:
Adversity, Ambition, Belief, Compassion, Christmas, Death, Fear, Forgiveness, God's Love, Joy, Love, Pain, Temptation, and Worship.

As well as reading the verse to you, it will tell you which Book, Chapter, and Verse the quote is from for further Bible reading.

To open the app simply ask Alexa, "Open Bible Themes".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
